name: Grave Digger (itch) (MonoFlauta, Alvious, AndreaAlonso, hugogmn, alan1203, TaaroBravo)
name_original: Grave Digger (itch) (MonoFlauta, Alvious, AndreaAlonso, hugogmn, alan1203, TaaroBravo)
description:
This game was made for the 7DRL Challenge 2023, where the goal was to make a roguelike game in a week.

FEATURES

  • 7 enemies including a final boss fight
  • 8 different perks to unlock
  • 4 different shovels to get
  • Unique combo mechanic, the bigger the combo, the better abilities

CREDITS

Artist: Hugo Miraballes

Programming: Andrea Alonso, Alan Rosas, Lautaro Bravo de la Serna & Facundo Balboa

Game Design: Gustavo Ayala
